rule: Each output must strictly adhere to the capitalization format provided, with all part-of-speech tags written in uppercase, and both "Unknown" and "CantAnswer" written in sentence capitalization as specified.
output: CC: Direct object (object of the preposition "obtrasse")
complianceText:
The chatbot output provides a part-of-speech tag (CC) and then a description of its function, which is not requested in the chatbot description. The description asks for only the tag.
